titles.title: Expressing the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Juanita Millender-McDonald, a Representative from the State of California.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 328.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 4/23/2007--Passed House without amendment. Expresses the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Juanita Millender-McDonald, a Representative from California. Declares that when the House adjourns on April 23, 2007, it stand adjourned as a further mark of respect to the memory of Representative Millender-McDonald.
